Text: Normally, I would call BS on a leak this early on, but if its trfkad, it's legit. Not even a million thanks could describe the amount of thanks for this!!

This album is actually called 
Bon Iver, Bon Iver
So artist and album is
Bon Iver - Bon Iver, Bon Iver
Thank You So Much Bro, Perfect!
Thanks - Dont know how this is so early but I'm very happy that it is.
Thank you for this, by the way where is track 11 titled I can't make you love me/Nick of time?
it's the first time I hear of this track 11. I don't see it on amazon; could be a bonus track?
This is great but is it just me or are tracks one and two sounding heavily distorted?
I can't make you love me was just something Justin did on Jimmy Fallon he siad it was a one time thing

@edium: no it's not. Check out http://www.npr.org/2011/06/09/136855313/first-listen-bon-iver-bon-iver and read the article. It's just self-titled

@aninternalaffair: yeah, it does. But if you stream it on NPR (link above), it sounds grainy on there too. I think it's the actual recording, and not this torrent.

Thax a lot ...love this band ! 
I always say ther's something special about this band (:
a many tanks to you, sir! cheers
